[{"wordEn":"assembly:   meeting, assembly, gathering","wordAn":"kampoŋ","langSubgroup":"WMP","langName":"Ngaju Dayak","wordEnLong":"(often intensified by kawalafter it), be under the control of a chief","setnote":"Almost certainly a product of borrowing from Malay.
